title: Four fruiting trees for drought-prone gardens

tasks.task: Perform maintenance and adjustments on a combine harvester
subtasks: Walk around the combine harvester to check its components
Open the combine harvester's hood to access internal mechanisms
Inspect the combine harvester's engine and transmission
Check the integrity of the combine harvester's belt system
Lubricate moving parts of the combine harvester as needed
Tighten loose bolts or nuts on the combine harvester
Test the combine harvester's hydraulics and adjust pressure if necessary

tasks.task: Adjust the combine harvester's sickle bar
subtasks: Access the combine harvester's sickle bar mechanism
Evaluate the cutting depth of the sickle bar
Make necessary adjustments to the sickle bar height
Check the sickle bar for damage or wear and replace if needed

tasks.task: Inspect the combine harvester's sieve
subtasks: Open the combine harvester's sieve door to access the sieve mechanism
Check the sieve's openings for blockages or wear
Clean the sieve if necessary
Check the sieve's tension and adjust if needed

tasks.task: Check the combine harvester's header
subtasks: Inspect the header's function and operation
Make any adjustments needed for proper header operation
Check the header's connection to the combine harvester
Ensure the header is securely attached to the combine

tasks.task: Test the combine harvester's threshing mechanism
subtasks: Run the combine harvester and monitor the threshing process
Check for any leaks or malfunctions in the threshing system
Adjust the threshing mechanism settings as needed

tasks.task: Check the combine harvester's chopper blade
subtasks: Inspect the chopper blade for damage or dullness
Sharpen the chopper blade if necessary
Replace the chopper blade if it is excessively worn

tasks.task: Maintain the combine harvester's air intake system
subtasks: Check the air filter for dirt and debris
Clean or replace the air filter if it is脏或堵塞
Adjust the air intake if it is restricted

tasks.task: Inspect the combine harvester's PTO (Power Take-Off)
subtasks: Check the PTO for proper engagement and disengagement
Lubricate the PTO system
Inspect the PTO drive shaft for any damage or wear

tasks.task: Check the combine harvester's electrical system
subtasks: Test the combine harvester's lights and signaling systems
Check battery charge and replace if necessary

tasks.task: Clean the combine harvester's glass and mirrors
subtasks: Use a windshield wiper fluid and cloth to clean the glass
Clean any mirrors attached to the combine harvester

tasks.task: Maintain the combine harvester's hydraulic system
subtasks: Check the hydraulic fluid level and refill if needed
Inspect hydraulic hoses for leaks or damage

tasks.task: Lubricate the combine harvester's bearings
subtasks: Identify the bearings needing lubrication
Apply lubricant to the bearings as per maintenance schedule

tasks.task: Perform overall safety checks on the combine harvester
subtasks: Check for any fluid leaks (oil, hydraulic, etc.)
Verify the securement of all attachments and implements
Inspect the overall structure for cracks or damage
Check tire pressure and condition of the tires
Test emergency brakes and ensure they are functional

tasks.task: Adjust the combine harvester's grain configuration
subtasks: Open the combine harvester's door to access the grain tank
Check the grain level and clean the tank if necessary
Adjust the grain configuration settings as needed

tasks.task: Set up the combine harvester for operation
subtasks: Attach the straw walker or other implements as required
Connect the combine harvester to the transport vehicle
Secure the combine harvester to the transport for movement

tasks.task: Prepare the combine harvester for operation
subtasks: Fill the grain tank with fuel
Check the combine harvester's PTO for readiness
Test all operational functions before beginning work

tasks.task: Perform a detailed inspection of the combine harvester's header
subtasks: Examine the header's scissor mechanism
Check the header's elevator arms for smooth movement
Ensure the header's knifes are sharp and properly spaced

tasks.task: Adjust the combine harvester's gauge wheels
subtasks: Position the gauge wheels correctly to set the width of the harvest swath
Secure the gauge wheels to the combine harvester

tasks.task: Lubricate the combine harvester's bearings and pivot points
subtasks: Identify all pivot points and bearings requiring lubrication
Apply appropriate lubricant to each pivot point and bearing

tasks.task: Clean the combine harvester's air filter
subtasks: Remove the air filter for inspection
Wash the air filter according to manufacturer's instructions
Replace the air filter if it is excessively dirty or damaged

tasks.task: Check the combine harvester's engine oil level
subtasks: Open the engine oil fill cap and check the oil level
Refill the engine oil if the level is low

tasks.task: Conduct a pre-harvest safety inspection on the combine harvester
subtasks: Inspect all safety features and alert systems
Check emergency stop mechanisms
Test the combine harvester's horn and other alerts

tasks.task: Clean the combine harvester's optical sensors
subtasks: Access the optical sensors located on the header
Remove any debris or dirt from the sensors
Check the sensors for proper alignment and adjust if necessary

tasks.task: Replace the combine harvester's drive belt
subtasks: Identify the correct replacement belt for the combine
Remove the old belt and properly install the new one
Adjust the tension of the new belt to manufacturer's specifications
